properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
'Njay manako any
Feo miantso hoe :
Mihainoa ry tany,
Jeso ho avy re !

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Maranata, Maranata !
Tompo Ã´ ! avia
Miandry ela ny olonao
O ! avia, avia !

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Indro avy Izy
Amin-drahona !
Faly sy mihoby
'Zay niomana.
Maranata, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mihorohoro mafy
'Reo tsy vonona,
Miantso vatolampy
Hialofana.
Maranata, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
'Zaho, ry Mpamonjy
Tano ho Anao.
Mba ho voavonjy,
Ka hidera Anao.
Maranata, sns.
